page.title: 08CULWORTH VILLAGE STORES
page.content: The little shop on the village green is unfortunately for sale. The reason being that the shopkeepers believe that small village shops no longer pay.Local people are now more mobile and travel to supermarkets in Banbury and some even as far away as Milton Keynes New Town Shopping Centre. It is a typical sell everything village shop,from nappies to paint and an atlas to a nail.The proprietors are willing to obtain anything the shopper could wish for,collecting goods from various cash and carry establishments, usually in Northampton. The ten most popular items are {SWEETS,26p qtr } {BREAD,50p} {FIRELIGHTERS,30p {TOILET ROLL65p} {CIGARETTES,$1:30-20} {CORNFLAKES,79p} {POTATOES,20p(3lbsnew}){PET FOOD,34p} {COFFEE,$1:60,100g}{TINNED TOMATOES24p}
